original_text: In the fifth year of King Rehoboam, Shishak king of Egypt came up against Jerusalem.
korean_text: 르호보암 왕 제오년에 애굽의 왕 시삭이 올라와서 예루살렘을 치고

sentences.original_text: In the fifth year of King Rehoboam
Shishak king of Egypt came up against Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 왕 시삭이 예루살렘을 쳐 올라왔습니다
